name: tokenizer
title: Tokenizer
description: Quickly count tokens in selected text or clipboard content using popular AI model encodings.
author: ashleymavericks

commands.name: tokenizeSelected
commands.title: Count Tokens in Selection
commands.description: Counts the tokens of the selected text.

preferences.name: tokenizer
preferences.title: Tokenizer Encoding
preferences.description: Choose the encoding to use for counting tokens.

commands.name: tokenizeClipboard
commands.title: Count Tokens from Clipboard
commands.description: Counts the tokens of the text in your clipboard.

preferences.name: tokenizer
preferences.title: Tokenizer Encoding
preferences.description: Choose the encoding to use for counting tokens.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
